meaningMnemonic: Use a <kanji>number in a series</kanji> to <kanji>group</kanji> the things you watch and listen to. That makes them your <vocabulary>program</vocabulary>s. Your TV and radio programs, specifically. If you watch TV you'll hear it a lot!
readingMnemonic: This word consists of the on'yomi reading for 番 and the kun'yomi reading for 組. You've learned them both so as long as you remember the rendaku, you should be able to read this word too!
